item.title: Git With 2FA on Linux
item.description: SSH keys have, for a long time, been the preferred method of authentication when using Git with remote repositories.

item.title: How I Do Backups
item.description: For the last six years I have been using a backup product called SpiderOak One which puts a large focus on privacy - it even got a recommendation from Edward Snowden.

item.title: Configuring libvirt guest lookup on Fedora
item.description: Gnome Boxes and Virtual Machine Manager are great tools for running virtual machines on Linux.

item.title: First Post
item.description: My first post with an explanation to why I begin blogging in 2023.
